docs.lead_paragraph: International A3-10 WAR STORIES OF A SERB A Serbian commander, charging that his people have been slaughtered by Muslims since his troops pulled back from Gorazde, said in an interview that his militia is back on the offensive. A1 Two U.N. peackeepers died when gunfire hit an aid convoy. A10
